name: worktree-forms
description: Production-ready form management system with visual builder and admin panel

scripts.dev: npm run dev -w apps/frontend & npm run dev -w apps/backend
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/frontend && npm run build -w apps/backend
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/frontend && npm run test -w apps/backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage -w apps/frontend && npm run test:coverage -w apps/backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/frontend && npm run lint -w apps/backend
